properties.name: Bestbuy
properties.description: Posted by Mikestoolz MikesTooLz - I normaly go to this bestbuy for blackfriday.

properties.name: Cambo357
properties.description: Posted by Cambo357 Magnolia/Tyler area of Riverside. pretty much my home base area of operations. there is a mall (with JC Penny, Macys, and Nordstrom), Sports Authority, Target, Mervyns, Sport Chalet, Bed Bath & Beyond, Staples, Big Lots, Circuit City, Big 5, Lowes, Toys r Us, Burlington, Best Buy, Office Depot, Walmart, Kmart all within less than 10 minute drive. this or the Corona Crossings area will likely be the location of our efforts.

properties.name: Canyon Springs Shopping area
properties.description: Posted by Cambo357 another large area for the pillaging. Costco, CC, Target, Sears , Mervyns, Walmart , BB&B, LnT , BB, Staples , Sams Club, Toys r Us/Babies r Us, Old Navy , Lowes, Home Depot, a mall, and handful of other smaller places all within 10 minute or less drive. sadly, I hate the area in general. way too much ghetto influence and attitude.

properties.name: Circuit City
properties.description: Posted by Mikestoolz MikesTooLz - This is the last place you want to be on black friday. Line gets twice as long as other stores, and goes 4 times slower then other stores because they only let 10 - 15 people in at a time and wait for them to leave before the let more people in. Also they only open 2 registers.

properties.name: Corona Crossings
properties.description: Posted by Cambo357 I have also done BF here. quite a host of stores. Best Buy, Target, Barnes Noble, Bed Bath & Beyond, Gamestop, Kohls, Old Navy, Petco, Ross, Sports Authority, Staples, Tillys, and other places. this or the Magnolia/Tyler area will likely be the location of our efforts.

properties.name: Eastvale Gateway
properties.description: Posted by Cambo357 another large cluster of stores. Best Buy, Kohls, Tillys, Sport Chalet, Target, Home Depot, Borders, Ritz and number of other smaller stores here, and a Circuit City, Ross, Lowes and more on the other side of the freeway. never done BF here. one year had a group of 4-5 campers there at 8am thurs, said they were saving places for another 15 or so that were coming that night. I said screw that and went elsewhere to be like 10th in line. still, it is a possibility, though we would have less home crew support.
